title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.7 - Prohibited discharges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.7 - Prohibited discharges

State Regulations

No person, firm, partnership, corporation, association or
other entity, including any of the signatory parties, any political
subdivision, agency, department or instrumentality of any of them, shall cause
or permit any pollution or violate the effluent quality requirements or
allocations of stream assimilative capacity imposed by or determined pursuant
to this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
861.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
